_lli_info Struct Reference

This structure describes the LLI/ARP Information Object. More...

#include <lliif.h>


Data Fields

LIST_NODE Links
 Links to other LLI_INFO Objects.
UINT8 IsStatic
 Boolean Flag to indicate whether this LLI entry is a static / dynamic entry.
IPN IPAddr
 The 4 byte IPv4 address associated with this LLI/ARP Entry.
UINT8 MacAddr [6]
 The 6 byte Ethernet MAC address associated with this LLI/ARP Entry.

Detailed Description

This structure describes the LLI/ARP Information Object.

This data structure is used by the LLI module to populate LLI/ARP Entry information contained in the NDK Kernel in a simple, user-friendly way to the application.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
  • inc/stack/inc/lliif.h
